Description: Verify successful response for valid name
Steps: 1. Send a GET request to /hello/Athena\n2. Observe the response
ExpectedResult: Status code: 200, Response body: Hello, Athena!

Description: Verify error response for empty name
Steps: 1. Send a GET request to /hello/\n2. Observe the response
ExpectedResult: Status code: 400, Response body: Name cannot be empty

Description: Verify error response for special characters in name
Steps: 1. Send a GET request to /hello/Athena!\n2. Observe the response
ExpectedResult: Status code: 400, Response body: Invalid characters in name

Description: Verify response with minimum length name
Steps: 1. Send a GET request to /hello/a\n2. Observe the response
ExpectedResult: Status code: 200, Response body: Hello, a!

Description: Verify response with maximum length name
Steps: 1. Send a GET request to /hello/AthenaAthenaAthenaAthenaAthena\n2. Observe the response
ExpectedResult: Status code: 200, Response body: Hello, AthenaAthenaAthenaAthenaAthena!
